Constructor Detail

Common

public Common()
Method Detail

arrayToString

public static java.lang.String arrayToString(java.lang.String[] array)
Pack a string array into a single string so that it can be sent in a message, since messages can only handle one string.

Parameters:
array - the array of strings
Returns:
a composite string which can be decomposed using stringToArray.

stringToArray

public static java.lang.String[] stringToArray(java.lang.String str)
Uses the TOKEN delimiter to convert a string to an array. Thus a string array packed into a single string by the arrayToString method can be restored to a string array.

Parameters:
str - the composite string created with arrayToString
Returns:
the original string array.

envStringArray

public static java.lang.String[] envStringArray()
Get a set of relevant environment strings about the user.

Returns:
a set of relevant environment strings
